QuestData.Title: Battle Axe of the Thunder King
QuestData.Description: The final artifact is the Thunder King's axe.$B$BLei Shen charged into battle with his spear in one hand, and his axe in the other.$B$BIt is said that he could throw his axe with brutal accuracy, and when it hit its target, it made a sound like crashing thunder.$B$BAfter his death, the axe was placed in a ceremonial chamber to the southwest.$B$BNeedless to say, we must not let it fall into the mogu's hands.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve the Battle Axe of the Thunder King.
